results.name: Number of ways of representing n as exactly 2 generalized pentagonal numbers.
xref: Cf. A001318 (generalized pentagonal numbers), A002107 (expansion of Product (1-x^k)^2, k=1..inf.), A093519 (A093518(n)=0).
